problems.title: Print Natural Numbers Reverse
problems.description:
Write a program to print all natural numbers in reverse from n to 1 using a while loop.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
Print numbers from n to 1, each on a new line.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
5
4
3
2
1

Explanation:
Numbers from 5 to 1 are printed.
hintsList: Initialize a counter variable to n.
Use a while loop to print the counter and decrement it until it reaches 1.
